QuestData.Title: Fresh Pots
QuestData.Description: We got a load of empty crab pots out there that need fresh bait.$B$BNow, we COULD pull them one at a time and bait them up here in comfort. A nice chair to sit on, maybe a hot cup of tea to keep you warm. Sounds nice, doesn't it?$B$BNever gonna happen.$B$BHead to Lonesome Cove, immediately southwest, and bait those pots with two chunks of fresh sea monarch. By "fresh" I mean killed right there in the water.$B$BOh, and by "pots" I mean traps. If you wanna be part of the crew, you'd better learn the lingo.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bait 10 Empty Crab Pots in Lonesome Cove. Each pot requires 2 Sea Monarch Chunks.
QuestData.CompletionText: What's wrong, green? You aren't afraid of the dark, icy sea are you?
